document.full_text: japan's government will not put a cap on the liabilities faced by tokyo electric power co  (tepco) for damages stemming from its crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant, chief cabinet secretary yukio edano said monday.
document.title: japan's edano: no limit on tepco nuclear compensation
lines_and_colors: japan's government will not put a cap on the liabilities faced by tokyo electric power co  (tepco) for damages stemming from its crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant, chief cabinet secretary yukio edano said monday.
